incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Etisalat Network in Egypt

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Etisalat network in Egypt. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: T-Mobile US API Errors Impacting Account Security Services

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Conference Insights API Returns 5xx for Conferences in US2 Region

incident_updates.body: Our engineers continue to work on the identified issue which is causing 5xx responses affecting the Conference Insights API for conferences created in the US2 region despite the previous fix being implemented. We expect to provide an update in the next 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Conference

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have once again identified the issue which is causing 5xx responses affecting the Conference Insights API for conferences created in the US2 region despite the previous fix being implemented. Our engineers continue to work on the issue. We expect to provide an update in the next 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Conference

incident_updates.body: A fix for the issue has been deployed and we will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Conference

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue which is causing 5xx responses affecting the Conference Insights API for conferences created in the US2 region and are still working to deploy a fix. affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Conference

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue which is causing 5xx responses affecting the Conference Insights API for conferences created in the US2 region and are working to deploy a fix. incidents.name: Unable to Receive OAuth Token From Stripe

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience issues with the 'Connect with Stripe' button on the Stripe Pay Connectors. New connections to Stripe are temporarily unavailable, we expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Pay

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Pay

incident_updates.body: The 'Connect with Stripe' button on the Stripe Pay Connectors page is currently not functional. Twilio customers who have already connected their Twilio Stripe connector to their Stripe account are unaffected, and their ability to perform Stripe transactions remains fully operational. New connections to Stripe are temporarily unavailable, we expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Pay

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Twilio stripe connector. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our carrier partner AT&T United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 January 2025 at 00:00 PST until 14 January 2025 at 02:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for AT&T United States customers.

Impacted Product: Verify Silent Network Auth

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: Scheduled maintenance for Flex Legacy Messaging

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance Activity: We would be performing a Database version upgrade, in the US1 region.
We anticipate about 1 minute of downtime during the cutover to the newer version of the database.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after this maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 2 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Programmable Chat
